sqlMap.select: select a.CL_DJXH as clDjxh,a.XH as xh,a.SJ_XM as sjXm,a.SJ_ZJHM as sjZjhm,a.SJ_SJHM as sjSjhm, a.SJ_LXDH as sjLxdh,a.JSZHM as jszhm,a.WHBZ as whbz,a.BZ as bz,a.YXBZ as yxbz from QY_YL_CLXX_SJ a where a.CL_DJXH=#clDjxh# and a.XH=#xh#
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_ZY_DJXH.CURRVAL as clDjxh from dual
insert into QY_YL_CLXX_SJ(CL_DJXH,XH,SJ_XM,SJ_ZJHM,SJ_SJHM, SJ_LXDH,JSZHM,WHBZ,BZ,YXBZ) values(#clDjxh:NUMERIC#,#xh:NUMERIC#,#sjXm:VARCHAR#,#sjZjhm:VARCHAR#,#sjSjhm:VARCHAR#, #sjLxdh:VARCHAR#,#jszhm:VARCHAR#,#whbz:VARCHAR#,#bz:VARCHAR#,#yxbz:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update QY_YL_CLXX_SJ set CL_DJXH=#clDjxh#,XH=#xh#,SJ_XM=#sjXm#,SJ_ZJHM=#sjZjhm#,SJ_SJHM=#sjSjhm#, SJ_LXDH=#sjLxdh#,JSZHM=#jszhm#,WHBZ=#whbz#,BZ=#bz#,YXBZ=#yxbz# where CL_DJXH=#clDjxh# and XH=#xh#
sqlMap.delete: delete from QY_YL_CLXX_SJ where CL_DJXH=#clDjxh# and XH=#xh#
